LanguageData.Concept_SimpleSidearmsBasic.label: SS:副武
LanguageData.Concept_SimpleSidearmsBasic.helpText:
Simple Sidearms

In order to equip weapons as sidearms, rightclick them and select the Equip as sidearm option.

Sidearms are listed in the Sidearms gizmo that is displayed when a colonist with at least one weapon is selected. By default, colonists will automatically switch to range-appropriate weapons, and will switch to a melee weapon when engaged in close combat. This behaviour can be altered in the mod settings.
LanguageData.Concept_SidearmsInInventory.label: SS: 配戴副武
LanguageData.Concept_SidearmsInInventory.helpText: Sidearms with a gray background are currently in a colonists inventory and eligible for use. 單擊左鍵切換武器. 單擊右鍵拋棄武器.
LanguageData.Concept_SidearmsPrimary.label: SS: Inactive primary weapons
LanguageData.Concept_SidearmsPrimary.helpText: Sidearms with a golden background are designated as a colonists primary weapon, but are currently not used as such. They will switch back to them once out of combat.
LanguageData.Concept_SidearmsMissing.label: SS: 缺少副武
LanguageData.Concept_SidearmsMissing.helpText: Sidearms with a dark purple background are currently missing from a colonists loadout. They will attempt to replace them at earliest opportunity, assuming any can be found. 單擊右鍵移除掉武器記錄.
LanguageData.Concept_SimpleSidearmsAdvanced.label: SS: 高級控制
LanguageData.Concept_SimpleSidearmsAdvanced.helpText: Colonists can have sidearm use configured on an individual basis. Switching the top lock to red forces the pawn to continue using their primary weapon even if other ranged weapon would provide more DPS. Manually switching to a weapon automatically disables autoswitching - this behaviour can be disabled using the bottom lock.
LanguageData.Concept_SimpleSidearmsDropping.label: SS: 拋棄武器
LanguageData.Concept_SimpleSidearmsDropping.helpText: 根據設置的不同,“Simple Sidearms”可能會導致殖民者在各種情況下掉落武器(默認是近身戰鬥). 不用擔心-您的殖民者將在戰鬥後取回武器.\n\n這是一項可自定義的功能-在mod設置中查看更多信息.
LanguageData.Concept_CEOverride.label: SS: CE補丁
LanguageData.Concept_CEOverride.helpText: Combat Extended 已加載. SimpleSidearms 庫存管理功能已禁用.
